CustomField.description: Cash Settlement Calculation: - If Total Final Settlement Cost is populated, then use Total Final Settlement Cost; - else (if the Actual # of bundles for settlement is populated then Settlement Total (Pre-tax) = (Actual # of bundles for settlement * Bundle Rate (Cash Settlement)) + Actual Labor Total - else Suggested # Bundles for Settlement * Bundle Rate (Cash Settlement) + Actual Labor Total
CustomField.formula: IF( NOT( ISBLANK( Settlement_Amount__c ) ) , Settlement_Amount__c , IF( NOT( ISBLANK( Num_of_Bundles_for_Settlement__c ) ) , Num_of_Bundles_for_Settlement__c * Bundle_Rate_Cash_Settlement__c + Actual_Labor_Total__c , Suggested_Bundles_for_Settlement__c * Bundle_Rate_Cash_Settlement__c + Actual_Labor_Total__c) )
CustomField.label: Conga: Cash Settlement Total
